product_name: Trigger Point Performance Grid 2.0 Foam Roller
long_description: Twice as long as the original version, the Trigger Point Performance Grid 2.0 foam roller provides more coverage for massaging sore muscles after a long run or hard CrossFit workout. Built from EVA foam, the Grid 2.0 roller has zones that provide different intensities of massage; hollow design uses less foam than many other styles of rollers. Low and flat sections feel like a massage with the forearm or palm; small square sections are firm and feel like fingertips; long tubular sections feel like fingers and thumb. Use the Grid 2.0 to massage your latissimi dorsi muscles (lats), quadriceps, hamstrings, IT bands, lower back and any other large muscle group. Roller can be incorporated into your everyday workout to intensify push-ups, crunches and other core exercises. Designed to withstand repeated use without breaking down. Trigger Point Performance Grid 2.0 foam roller measures 5 x 26 in. and has a hollow core to keep the weight down.
short_description: Twice as long as the original version, the Trigger Point Performance Grid 2.0 foam roller provides more coverage for massaging sore muscles after a long run or hard CrossFit workout.
